title: You Got Me (Where You Want Me)
lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Looks like the more you hurt me, the more I want you
'Cause I keep running on back for more
Oh baby, oh baby, oh baby, honey, sweetie pie
Yeah, you got me where you want me now
That's right where I wanna be
[Verse 2]
Looks like the more I need you, the less I see you
The thrill nearly kills me when I'm in your arms
Oh baby, oh baby, oh baby, honey, sweetie pie
Yeah, you got me where you want me now
That's right where I wanna be
[Bridge]
It makes me happy, just to hear your name
The way I love you, it's a sin and a shame
I can't get wit'cha, I wanna even try
'Cause when you're mean and evil, are you satisfied?
Whoa-oh
[Verse 3]
Looks like nothing I do seems to satisfy
Sometimes I wanna break right down and cry
Oh baby, oh baby, oh baby, honey, sweetie pie
Yeah, you got me where you want me now
That's right where I wanna be

[Bridge]
It makes me happy, just to hear your name
The way I love you, it's a sin and a shame
I can't get wit'cha, I wanna even try
When you're mean and evil, are you satisfied?
Whoa-ho
[Verse 3]
Looks like nothing I do, nothing I do seems to satisfy
Sometimes I wanna break right down and cry
Oh baby, oh baby, oh baby, honey, sweetie pie
Yeah, you got me where you want me now
That's right where I wanna be
[Outro]
Right where I wanna be, yeah, yeah
You got me where you want me
You got me where you want me
And that's, and that's right where I wanna be
Yeah, yeah, child, that's where I wanna be, yeah
Got me where you want me
